settings.title: The Ideal Sunday
settings.text: Eco friendly, plastic free and zero waste products from UK brands for those who care for our planet and want to make small changes towards living a greener lifestyle - Welcome to the Ideal Sunday, the eco shop who plant a tree for every order.

settings.title: Hey I'm Will, the founder of The Ideal Sunday
settings.text: Inspired by a walk in the woods one sunny December day, The Ideal Sunday exists as a place for everyone to find quality products that benefit their life, and prioritise our planet.

settings.title: Our mission is to share the joy of plants for happier homes and a healthier planet. We help you discover beautiful plants for your home and hand-deliver them directly to your door, in the most sustainable manner possible.
How We Began
settings.text:
Like a lot of us, for the last few years I've been trying my best to make more eco-friendly decisions to help save our planet. But I found it difficult to identify those small yet impactful changes I could make in my day-to-day life.

The Ideal Sunday was created with an appreciation of the environment. Together with a walk through the woods on a sunny December afternoon and a couple of glasses of wine with friends, I decided I wanted to create a space that makes it easy for people like me to live more sustainably. Somewhere to find products that make life simpler, easier and healthier for everyone, without it breaking the bank or adding hours to our already busy lives.

settings.title: Our Values
settings.text: Here at The Ideal Sunday, weâ€™re guided by two core values. They shape every decision we make, every product we sell and every interaction we have.

settings.title: Sustainability Efforts
settings.text: Since the very beginning, The Ideal Sunday has been dedicated to giving back by striving for a sustainable planet. That's why we plant a tree for every order.

settings.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.title: Get to know how we operate
Where do you source your products from?
settings.text: We source our products from small UK businesses who share our values for sustainability. The onboarding of new brands takes a lot of time and research before we start stocking their products on our website so you can be assured that whatever you buy from The Ideal Sunday is a truly sustainable product.

settings.title: How do you plant a tree for every order?
settings.text:
We have proudly partnered with Ecologi to plant a tree for every order placed on our website. You can also plant as many more trees as you like by adding trees in your bag or going here.Â 

At the end of every month we count up the number of orders and extra trees and plant them on the Ecologi website. Why not check out our Digital Forest to see all the trees weâ€™ve planted!

settings.title: What packaging will you use for my delivery?
settings.text: We strongly believe that all packaging should be fully recyclable and of course 100% plastic free. Whatâ€™s the point in shopping sustainably if your products come in plastic packaging?! You can shop with confidence knowing that we have done the research to get your products to you in the most eco-friendly manner.

settings.title: What are Reward Points and how can I use them?
settings.text:
You can earn 5 points for every Â£1 spent at our store. You can also earn points for creating an account, following us on Instagram and Facebook and for celebrating your birthday!Â 

500 points = Â£5 coupon

900 points = Â£10 coupon

For more information on Rewards Points click here.

settings.title: How do referrals work?
settings.text: You and a friend can each earn Â£10 credit to use towards your next purchase. Simply refer a friend here and once they have placed an order you will receive the Â£10 discount code.

settings.title: I just placed my order, when will my items be dispatched?
settings.text: Firstly, thanks for placing an order! If you placed it before 12pm Mon - Fri then it will dispatch that same day. If you placed it after 12pm then it will dispatch the next working day. Weekend orders will dispatch on Monday unless that day is a bank holiday which means it will dispatch Tuesday.Â

settings.title: How long until I receive my order?
settings.text:
UK
Standard delivery (48hr) will be delivered 2-3 days after dispatch. 24hr hour delivery will be delivered 1-2 days after dispatch which is usually next day if you order before 12pm.

Europe

Your delivery should take between 5 - 7 working days.

Rest Of The World

Your delivery should take between 7 - 10 working days.

Please note: Due toÂ COVID-19 some orders are being held at the border for longer so delays can be expected.

Please note: All international orders are subject to import and/or customs charges, which the receiver/customer is liable for. The Ideal Sunday cannot be responsible for these additional charges.

settings.title: I donâ€™t like my product, can I return it?
settings.text:
We gladly accept returns of unusedÂ products within 14 days of receipt - to read more please visit our Delivery & Returns page.

Please note: Products must be unused and in their original packaging. Products will be assessed upon return before a refund is processed.

settings.title: Something is wrong with my order!
settings.text: If you have received an incorrect product or your product is faulty then please let us know within 14 days of receipt and one of our customer service team will advise on the return of the original product and assist you with a replacement or refund.

settings.subtitle: Our story
settings.title: The Ideal Sunday is here to bring you the best range of sustainable products whilst planting a forest along the way.

settings.subtitle: Our Mission
settings.title: To inspire sustainable living through little changes. It's good for you and it's good for the planet.
settings.text:
Weâ€™ll achieve our mission by making sustainable living fun and accessible to everyone.

No one can be can be sustainable over night. This is a journey weâ€™re taking together, and we're here to help you every step of the way. The Ideal Sunday is a place to learn, share and shop responsibly, with the confidence that weâ€™re all playing a part in a greener future.

settings.subtitle: Our Story
settings.title: It all started with a walk in the woods.
settings.text:
The Ideal Sunday started with a walk in the woods with a couple of friends on a sunny December afternoon. Inspired by the environment around us, and my new reusable coffee cup, I decided to start a company that helped connect regular people like us with awesome eco-friendly products.

The thought was simple - with small changes, we could change the world, without changing too much about our lives. A couple of months later - and just a few weeks before we catapulted into a global pandemic - Iâ€™d left my job (oops!), built our website (wahoo!) and filled my little flat with the beginnings of our small but perfectly formed product line.

Weâ€™re called The Ideal Sunday in honour of that afternoon.Â Â Itâ€™s stuck around because we like it, and because it means something different to everyone. My ideal Sunday is about exercise, some delicious food, a walk in the woods. Yours could be a game of footy, a hungover breakfast, or an unprecedented lie-in without your kids!

Whatever it is, we want to help you enjoy it even more, by adding that feel-good factor of knowing youâ€™re taking a step towards a greener future. So go ahead and check out our blog and products, and hopefully youâ€™ll pick up some new ideas. Weâ€™re a place to learn, share and shop responsibly. You donâ€™t have to change what you love, but maybe you can make it better ðŸ’š

Will - Founder of The Ideal Sunday

settings.title: You can plant trees too.
settings.text: We've made it easy for you to contribute to our pledge by planting trees too. All you have to do is add the Plant Extra Trees product at checkout and we'll count them up at the end of every month and add them to our digital forest!

settings.subtitle: Delivery & Returns
settings.title: Express, plastic free delivery on all orders

settings.code:
Delivery

UK DELIVERY

Free 48 Hour UK Delivery for orders over Â£40.

Orders placed before 12pm Monday-Friday will dispatch same day.

Royal Mail 48 Hour (2-3 days) Â£2.95
Royal Mail 24 Hour (1-2 Days) Â£4.75

INTERNATIONAL DELIVERY

Deliveries to Europe are currently on hold due to the new Brexit policies. We apologise for any inconvenience

Outside Europe - Tracked (7-10 Working Days) Â£15.00

Delivery times are from time of dispatch.

Orders outside of the EU may be subject to customs charges and tax duty which you will need to pay before the order is delivered.

Customs Delays

Due to COVID-19 custom delivery officers worldwide are experiencing serious delays processing custom clearance.

Returns

If you aren't 100% satisfied with your order you may returnÂ it toÂ us as long as it's unused and in it's original packaging. Please notify us within 14 days from date of dispatch by emailing support@theidealsunday.com so we can organise the return.

Once your order has been returned and checked we will issue a refund (excluding the delivery costs).

Unless your item is faulty you will be responsible for paying the return delivery cost.Â We suggest youÂ send yourÂ returns viaÂ a tracked service as we cannot take any responsibility for lost items.

Due to the nature of our products there are many that we are unable to accept back due to hygiene reasons, so please contact us before you send products back to us.
